channel.title: Vps Troubles
channel.description:
So i put my server on the vps, Server is running, Port 43594 is open, Got the client jard with the correct ips, supplied a dl link with the cache (jus incase they needed it, i know some clients do it automaticaly) And for some dumb reason i can login, But asoon as somone else trys to login the client wont load and says "error loading". I have looked all over the place and it seems noone has ever had this problem? could someone please help
Source and client are trisidiax v3

item.title: Vps Troubles
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:2, topic:536438”]They probably didn’t extract the cache to their C:[/quote]well i never will use trisidia x v3 since i cant get to change annything like the ip etc i wanted to use that as base for my server since it has sof/and some customs

but ye i left it behind just for that reason (i cannot cusomize the server to my likings)

Read full topic

item.title: Vps Troubles
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

They probably didn’t extract the cache to their C:

Read full topic
